info.name: Diamond Pattern II
info.description: Fored from [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/user/FabriceNeyret2]Dr. Neyret[/url]'s diamond pattern [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lsVczV[/url] without vlip

renderpass.code:
// Fored from [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/user/FabriceNeyret2]Dr. Neyret[/url]'s diamond pattern [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view/lsVczV[/url] without vlip
#define mainImage(O,u)               /*  6. / vec2(1.5,1) */                 \
    vec2 U = abs( fract( u/iResolution.y* vec2(4,6) * mat2(1,-1,1,1) ) - .5);\
    O += .3 - cos ( 19.*max(U.x,U.y)  + texture(iChannel0,U).r )
renderpass.name: Image
